channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Australian Olympic Committee hits out at criticism of controversial breaker Raygun
item.description: The Australian Olympic Committee has criticized an anonymous online petition attacking controversial Paris Games breaking competitor Rachael Gunn, saying the petition was “vexatious, misleading and bullying.”

item.title: These six House races are ones to watch in this year’s election
item.description: Resources are pouring into the few truly competitive congressional races expected to help determine the balance of power in Washington next year.

item.title: Millions of kids are still skipping school. Could the answer be recess — and a little cash?
item.description: Years after COVID, nearly every state is still struggling with school attendance. Roughly one in four students remained chronically absent in the 2022-23 school year, according to an analysis by The Associated Press and Stanford University economist Thomas Dee.
